name: Solar Energy Harvester
description: A solar-powered robot that searches for the best sunspots on the beach or desert to collect and store solar energy.

name: Trash Collector
description: A robot designed to roam the beach, pick up trash, store it, and empty it in a designated location.

name: Drink Vendor
description: A robot that navigates sidewalks or beaches, vending drinks to people, made from recycled parts.

name: Chat Assistant
description: A robot that roams around and talks to people using free GPT generative AI, built with recycled junkyard parts.
